intro: TF Watcher is a simple to use Python package and web app which allows you to monitor ðŸ‘€ your Machine Learning training or testing process on mobile devices ðŸ“± built specially for Google Colab, Azure ML and Kaggle.
intro2: Dedicated to all ML Developers with ðŸ’œ
desc: TF Watcher is completely open-sourced and you can easily start using this in your TensorFlow training, evaluation, and prediction processes with as little as 2 lines of code! You can use this project with premade training loops or also use it in the exact same manner in your custom training loops too, even in a TensorFlow graph. Further, you can monitor your model's performance or progress in real-time. Get started in no time with the Quickstart example.

features.content: TF Watcher is completely open-source, you could read the code behind this or contribute to this project
Monitor your models in near-realtime on your mobile phones
Using TF Watcher is very easy and does not require any changes to your workflow
With charts and graphs you can easily make sense of your metrics and monitor them on mobiles seamlessly

footer: If you are using this project as a company or if you want to sponsor the development of this project please feel free to contact us. In all other cases: bug report, feature request, or usage questions please create a GitHub issue.
